programme.title: Capturing water
programme.desc: In 2018, Cape Town narrowly averted completely running out of drinking water. The city council committed to take urgent action to protect water supplies by enforcing a policy of limited access. Capturing Water follows the fight to overturn water cuts-offs, which are punitive to the Capes many poor dwellings and exposes the lethal pitfalls of market-led solutions to the water crisis.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 2. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Pakkanen kiristyy ja paivat lyhenevat, mika vaikeuttaa ansojen tarkastusta. Edna ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa, kun sudet tuhoavat hanen ansansa.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jouluna kavelylla olleet isa ja tyttaret joutuvat kengurun hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Leijona vetaa naisen jalat kaltereiden toiselle puolelle elainten suojelukeskuksessa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Sotajalalla. Jacksonin apua pyytavat pariskunta, joka ei pysty muuttamaan yhteen vihamielisten kissojensa vuoksi, ja sotaveteraani, jonka kissa suhtautuu vakivaltaisesti tyttoystavan koiraan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 13/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Elainsuojelujarjesto Animal Defenders International on tyoskennellyt 40 vuotta sirkuselainten kieltamiseksi. Suurimmat pelastusoperaatiot tapahtuvat Perussa.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Afrikanpingiviinien yhteiso toivottaa uusimmat jasenet tervetulleeksi parittelukauden jalkeen. Lisaksi uusi merisaukko laitetaan lajitoveriensa joukkoon.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva on tuntematon kasite Planned Pethood Plus -elainlaakarilla. Lukemattomille asiakkaille ja heidan lemmikeilleen elainlaakari Jeff Young on viimeinen toivo.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Yuki-bulldoggi on syonyt jotain sopimatonta, ja elainlaakari Bluen selvittaa nyt mita. Elainlaakari Lavignen adoptoima kissa tarvitsee hoitoa kaksoisamputaation jalkeen.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kaapiovuohi saapuu vastaanotolle paiseen takia. Kameroita vieroksuva suojelukoira tyollistaa elainlaakari Lavignea. Elainlaakari Blue pitaa sukupuolenpaljastamisjuhlat.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun taistelee kovassa tuulessa pelastaessaan suloista Tigger-kissaa, joka on ennenkin jaanyt kiikkiin korkeuksiin. Lisaksi Tom tulee hatiin Fritterin luo.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 6/10. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Hurrikaani Isaac on iskemassa New Orleansiin. Tia vie koiria turvaan evakuointikeskukseen. Kuka osuu hirmumyrskyn reitille, ja millaista tuhoa myrsky aiheuttaa tarhalla?

programme.title: Kaikki kissoista
programme.desc: Rotutietoa, historiaa ja muita kummallisia kissafaktoja seka sopoja temppuja, joiden ansiosta kissasta tuli koiraa suositumpi lemmikki Amerikassa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 13/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson kumppaneineen rakentaa piilopirtteja puuhun niille, jotka tahtovat kosketuksiin luonnon ja sisaisen lapsensa kanssa.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.desc: Realitysarja. Perhe pistaa pystyyn fasaaninmetsastyskilpailun kiitospaivan kunniaksi. Billy ja Ami yllattavat lapset kotitilan uusilla asukkailla.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Paul Templer oli kanootissa Victoria-putousten lahella, kun virtahepo veti hanet veden alle. Viisivuotias Jade DeMoss etsi aitia, kun jokin hyokkasi hanen paalleen Teksasissa.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii joella.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Ilkea kissa estaa Robia ja Stephaniea saamasta vauvaa ja Jessican kissa rakastaa takaa-ajoa ja raapimista. Voiko kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackon Galaxy auttaa?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 14/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Katherine Connor johtaa perheineen norsujen pelastuskeskusta Thaimaassa. Nainen haluaa vapauttaa kahleista vanhan Pang Fai -nimisen norsun sen loppuelamaksi.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Tiimi odottaa innoissaan nayttelyn avaamista, jossa on harvinaisia albiinoalligaattoreita. Lisaksi sukeltajien pitaa sukeltaa valashai Tarokon kanssa saadakseen verinaytteen.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 10. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 9. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne korjaa koiran jalan ainutlaatuisella tavalla. Minipossun iso puraisu yrittaa irrottaa palasen elainlaakari Bluesta. Elainlaakari Ross hoitaa siilia.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Puumajan rakentajat kiipeavat Blue Ridge -vuorille pystyttamaan puumajaa kirvesmies Mikelle kiitokseksi Appalakkien jouluperinteen yllapitamisesta.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Earl nostattaa ehdonalaisvankien juhlamielta. Heidan avulla han koristelee Tahyo Tavernin ja valmistaa jouluaterian koko Villalobosin perheelle.

programme.title: Dogs 101
programme.desc: Koirarotujen kattavin tietosanakirja televisiossa tarkastelee viela viiden rodun temppuiluja, geeneja ja kuuluisimpia yksiloita.

programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraisesti ja parjaavat tiiviilla yhteistyolla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jouluna kavelylla olleet isa ja tyttaret joutuvat kengurun hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Leijona vetaa naisen jalat kaltereiden toiselle puolelle elainten suojelukeskuksessa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Murphy-koiranpentu syo palan koria, ja kun se poistetaan leikkauksella, loytyy vatsasta epanormaali verisuoni. Kirurgi Kathryn kauhistuu sen kokoa, pystyyko han parantamaan sen?

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Rakastetulla bassetilla on sairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Yuki-bulldoggi on syonyt jotain sopimatonta, ja elainlaakari Bluen selvittaa nyt mita. Elainlaakari Lavignen adoptoima kissa tarvitsee hoitoa kaksoisamputaation jalkeen.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes in Georgia and Azerbaijan as he journeys through the former Russian empire. He begins in the port of Batumi, discovers a surprise 19th-century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside, visits a private museum dedicated to Joseph Stalin - the most infamous Georgian of all - and discovers that a Briton was the first to conquer the highest mountain in the Caucasus range. Arriving in Azerbaijan, he learns about its role in the 19th-century oil industry.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Yorkshire-born Moli and his Californian wife Noelle in Tanzania, who run a safari business and live nomadically in a remote African wilderness.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: Historian David Olusoga uncovers how the British Empire lives on across the world.

programme.title: Panorama: Can Climate Scientists Save the World?
programme.desc: Panorama meets some of the brightest minds in climate science advocating more drastic action to halt climate catastrophe - including controlling the power of the weather.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes in Georgia and Azerbaijan as he journeys through the former Russian empire. He begins in the port of Batumi, discovers a surprise 19th-century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside, visits a private museum dedicated to Joseph Stalin - the most infamous Georgian of all - and discovers that a Briton was the first to conquer the highest mountain in the Caucasus range. Arriving in Azerbaijan, he learns about its role in the 19th-century oil industry.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europes rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets people who have turned their backs on Western society and set up home in some of the most isolated locations on Earth. Ben meets Niall, who rescues and cares for street dogs in Koh Samui.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Europes most active volcano, is in the experiencing its longest spate of eruptions in recent years. Our story starts almost a year earlier, long before the eruptions reach full force. Etna fires off intermittently and, on the summit, a new volcanic crater grows. What will happen next?

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in South Shields at a clothing factory where they produce 650 waxed jackets a day. He follows the production of water-resistant jackets from the arrival of 500-metre-long rolls of undyed cotton through to dispatch.

programme.title: Wild France
programme.desc: We start off in the heart of Provence that lies in the hills that join the sea to the high Alps. A land of fragrance and colour, prized by emperors and kings and whose famous light has attracted the greatest painters. 2/2

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita Rani, Ade Adepitan and Ant Anstead join 5.5 million commuters on the iconic Staten Island ferry, the subway and citibikes to find out about commuting in New York. 1/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: On the brink of losing everything shes worked for, Sue travels to Fairbanks, to officially buy her precious Kavik River Camp or else she will be left alone in the cold. Moments before what could possibly be the worst spring breakup of the season, Andy and Kate must move their dogs to an alternate location, or they will die in the flood.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to northern England and stays with host Paul in Lincolnshire onboard his 30-year-old converted military truck. He discovers why Paul traded living in a house for life on the road.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Spanish Canary Island La Palma. The Cumbre Vieja eruptions destructive lava flow has ruined thousands of homes and lives.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green explores an ancient trail along the stunning Jurassic Coast in Dorset, and comes face-to-skull with a giant Pliosaur, also known as a Sea-Rex

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: The adventurer returns to meet previous contributors who turned their back on the rat-race. In the wilds of Queensland he revisits the ever-resilient Bette, who, in her 80s, lives alone in a ramshackle house.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series. 2/2

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben spends time with Julia Pryke, who left behind a comfortable life in Berkshire, England, to live in a derelict two-bedroom farmhouse in the remote Hungarian countryside.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green sets out on one of the worlds most iconic pilgrimages: the Camino de Santiago, in search of what makes this journey so meaningful to so many.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team have been tasked with catching Ling from the WWI and WWII wrecks of Scapa Flow in Scotland, but as its so cold the fish will be tucked into the wrecked ships and theyll need an ingenious plan to try to catch them. 8/10

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Andy and Kate must move their dogs to avoid the flood. Meanwhile, Eric prepares for the grizzly bear hunting season.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lankas highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Volcano expert Chris Horsley is called back to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. After a recent eruption, a huge 10-mile-long fracture has appeared in the ground. It runs directly from the slopes of Nyiragongo volcano down to lake Kivu. Chris has come to explore why this has happened and what the consequences could be.

programme.title: Junamatka Eurooppaan
programme.desc: Kausi 6, 6/6. Kauden paatosjaksossa Michael Portillo tutustuu Uttar Pradesh -osavaltion paakaupunkiin Lucknowiin ja yrittaa selvittaa totuuden vuoden 1857 Lucknowin piirityksesta, mika enteili suoran brittihallinnon alkua Intiassa. Sitten Portillo matkustaa miljoonakaupunki Kalkuttaan, missa han muistelee intialaista Nobel-palkittua runoilijaa Rabindranath Tagorea. Portillo tarkastelee myos Intian rikasta tekstiiliteollisuutta ja sen modernisoitumista. Upeat kankaat ovat aina olleet tarkea osa Intian kulttuuria.

programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore -- all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Cheps disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent. But Lilits art lessons conflict with the fun project she has been working on with Mush-Mush and Chep. And when she sees that her friends are having a great time without her, Lilit is seriously annoyed which her paintings start showing

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he wont let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chips memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: theres one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabins solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when its being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwals car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thiefs warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something. All the evidence points toward Truffs new woodworm pet: Chompski. But Truff refuses to believe Chompski would do such a thing! Its up to Chep, Lilit and Mush-Mush to convince Truff. But first they have to catch Chompski in the act!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landladys back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Beans bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies cant help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landladys jewellery, its not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A milkman accidentally walks off with a maritime curio belonging to Bean _ who indignantly follows him to the bottling plant at the local dairy, determined to retrieve it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Teddy is at the dry cleaners and Mr Bean is feeling lonely. Then he finds a new friend: a goldfish in the pond. Bean has a great time with his new friend, until he discovers that not all fish in the sea are such sweethearts.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who isan Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become inventive himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Beans birthday dinner is ruined when he gets a bad table and ends up sitting next to a confused movie star. After swimming in the lobster tank, Mr Bean unknowingly takes revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!
